overview: Elegy For A Damned Individual is an independent film made by college students from the University of Michigan and across the country. It follows the lives of four degenerates: Vanya, E, Danny, and Marshall Law after their benefactor, Jazz Ukulele Virtuoso Hermann Mundungus, dies under mysterious circumstances. Watch as they try to cope with this unexpected loss in a psychadelic and psychological experience that has at once been compared to The Monkees' "Head" and Bu√±uel's "The Exterminating Angel".
title: Elegy For A Damned Individual
